issue.title: [FCD] pair copy-assignment not consistent for references

discussion.p: Copy-assignment for pair is defaulted and does not work for pairs with reference members. This is inconsistent with conversion-assignment, which deliberately succeeds even if one or both elements are reference types, just as for tuple. The copy-assignment operator should be consistent with the conversion-assignment operator and with tuple's assignment operators.
discussion.blockquote: Accepting n3140 would provide a superior resolution, because pair does not depend on the semantic requirements of CopyAssignable.
